document_data.name: Torch Street
document_data.starts: Crossing of the [[Swordstars Lane]] and [[Stonebow Street]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Torch Street''' was a curved street in the city of [[Suzail]] that ran parallel to [[Blade Lane]], not far from the city's eastern edge.

Description.Notable Locations: *[[Ring of Coins]], a pawnshop with a wide selection of goods. The store stood on Torch Street, before being relocated to the [[Court Close]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
